Doña María se dedica al a crianza de cuyes y pollos los mismos que vende en pie y pelados, también vende productos naturales, estos negocios le gusta porque existe ganancias, tiene espacio para estar con sus hijos y no descuidarse de su hogar. 
Esta repitiendo el  crédito ya que necesita comprar cuyes y pollos para seguir con su negocio.
texts.en:
Maria is part of the group called 'Mas Que Vencedoras'.  She lives near the center of the city of Azogues.  This city is well-known for the skilled crafts its people produce, and the friendliness of the inhabitants.  The center of the city is a mix of colonial and modern architecture and the people still maintain the culture and traditions of their ancestors.  

She enjoys being part of the group because of the support and camaraderie that exists between the members.  They are always ready to help each other with whatever might be needed.

Maria, 47, is married and has three children.  They are all of adult age.  One of them is married and lives independently.  Her two sons work and contribute to the finances. Her husband is a driver and offers his services to private companies.  They live in their own house.

Maria raises and sells guinea pigs and chickens.  She sells them plucked and alive.  She also sells natural products.  She enjoys these activities because she earns a profit and she has time to be with her children and still be able to look after the house.  

She is asking for a repeat loan because she needs to buy guinea pigs and chickens to continue with her business.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise to expand her clothes-selling business.

loans.name: Vinicio René

texts.es:
Vinicio abre su negocio cada mañana solo con el deseo de cuantas personas llegan con el a pedirle que les trabaja su motocicleta el tiene 30 años de edad tiene 2 hijos el primero es de 8 años de edad y es estudiante en la escuela de su comunidad y el segundo tiene 4 años de edad aun no está estudiando, sus hijos se ha convertido en un reto para el en poder sacarlos adelante dándoles las condiciones de vidas adecuadas y ver que se conviertan en profesionales.

La actividad que el desempeña es la reparación de motores de motocicletas para las personas y también pone a la disposición del público la venta de todo tipo de motocicletas ya que uno de los sueños de Vinicio era la venta de motos pues ya es una realidad ya que ahora le genera muy buena ganancia para poder sustentar a su familia y apoyar a sus hijos para que ellos tengan el estudio que se merecen.

El motivo por el cual el realiza un préstamo es para la compra de repuestos para motores de motocicletas para poder repararlas.  Uno de las aspiraciones de Vinicio es la construcción de su casa, darles educación a sus hijos y que se conviertan en profesionales y prestar un buen servicio a las personas que lo requieren en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Vinicio starts work every morning with the simple hope that some people come along with their motorcycle and ask for his services.  He is 30 and has two children.  The eldest is eight and studies at school and the other is four and is not yet of school age.  Trying to provide for his children has become his daily challenge, as he wants to give them a comfortable life and see them become professionals when they are older.

He repairs motorbike engines and also sells all types of motorcycles.  This type of business was what he had always dreamed of, and now it has become reality.  He earns a very good living which allows him to provide for his family and take care of his children, giving them the education that they deserve.

He is asking for a loan to buy some spare parts for motorbike engines so that he can continue with his repairs.  One of his dreams is to build his own house.  Others are to continue to provide his children with an education and offer a good service to the people who need it in his local community.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for motorcycles.

loans.name: Xiomara Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Xiomara es habitante de chichigalpa es casada tiene 1 niño en edad escolar que depende de ella su esposo trabaja en el Ingenio san Antonio como safrero continuo en el área de riego desde hace 5 años ella cuenta con una pequeña pulperia desde hace 5 años la cual ha ido creciendo con forme el paso de los años y con el apoyo de los prestamos brindados.

La señora es una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora, que le gusta el comercio ella inicio su pequeña pulperia con capital propio en una mesita en su casa de habitación hoy en día tiene varios estante y su sueño es que el negocio se haga mas grande y poder constar con todos los productos del mercado para ofrecerle a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Xiomara is a resident in Chichigalpa.  She is married and has one child who goes to school and is dependent on her.  Her husband works at the San Antonio sugar mill as a laborer in the irrigation department; a job he has had for five years.  She has been running a small grocery store for five years, which has been expanding as the years have gone by with the help of the Kiva lenders.

She is a very enterprising and hard-working woman who likes commerce.  She set up her store with her own money, starting with products on a table in her home.  Now she has various shelves as well.  Her dream is to expand her business and be able to sell a wide range of products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy goods.

loans.name: Pedro Alberto

texts.es:
Pedro es un padre de familia amoroso, soltero, tiene 29 años de edad y vive en Ica junto a su familia. Tiene un niño de 6 años de edad, por quien lucha día a día para poder brindarle un mejor futuro. Su gran éxito en el trabajo se lo debe a la educación de calidad y los valores con los que fue inculcado cuando era niño.
Pedro está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá comprar un artefacto (refrigeradora) para su casa, de esta manera estará mejorando su calidad de vida y seguirá esforzándose para sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Pedro is the father of a beloved family.  He is single and they all live together in Ica.  Day in, day out, he strives to provide a better future for his six-year-old son. 

His success at work is due to the quality education he received and the values that were instilled in him when he was a child.

He is grateful to the Kiva lenders because with their support, he can buy a refrigerator for his home.  This will help him to improve the standard of living and he can keep on working hard to provide for his family.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator for his home.

loans.name: Clever Pedro

texts.es:
Clever es un padre de familia dedicado a sus 2 hijos, tiene 45 años de edad y vive en Imperial junto a su familia.
Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación pudo comprarse una mototaxi y desde hace varios años se dedica a brindar servicios de transporte por toda la zona. Es una persona muy exitosa gracias a su desempeño y a que se ha convertido en una persona confiable y respetada para los clientes.
Clever necesita realizar el arreglo de su moto y un mantenimiento de rutina, por lo cual agradece bastante a los prestamistas Kiva por el apoyo, ya que gracias a esto podrá hacer las reparaciones necesarias para no tener inconvenientes con el trabajo. De esta manera seguirá esforzándose para poder sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Clever is a father who is dedicated to raising his two children.  He is 45 and lives in Imperial together with his family.

Thanks to a lot of effort and dedication, he was able to buy a motor-taxi and he has been providing a service now for several years in the area. He is a successful person due to his hard work and he has become a reliable person who is well-respected by his clients.

He needs to make some repairs to his vehicle and give it a routine service.  For this reason, he is grateful to the Kiva lenders for their support, because the loan will allow him to carry out this maintenance and be able to carry on working.

In this way, he can keep working hard in order to provide for his family.

loans.use: to repair and maintain his motor-taxi.

loans.name: Maria Paula

texts.es: María de 45 años de edad vive con su esposo y su hijo de 23 años de edad. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que se dedica desde hace 4 años a la venta de productos por catálogo, además para tener mejores ingresos presta sus servicios domésticos 5 días a la semana. María desea mejorar su pequeño negocio por lo que solicita a FUSAI un crédito para invertir en la compra de más productos como: cosméticos, prendas de vestir, lociones, accesorios, etc. y así poder mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos.
texts.en: María is 45 years old and lives with her husband and 23-year-old son. María is an enterprising woman who, for four years, has made a living selling catalogue goods. In order to earn a higher income, she also works as a domestic servant five days a week. María wants to improve her little business and so is applying for a loan from FUSAI. This loan will be used to buy more goods such as cosmetics, clothes, lotions, accessories and more. With this, María can increase her sales and income.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, clothes, lotions, accessories and more.

loans.name: Ana Daisy

texts.es: Ana de 38 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus 2 hijos de 8 y 17 años de edad que actualmente se encuentran estudiando. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que desde hace 8 años se gana la vida con la venta de productos por catálogo. Ana desea aumentar sus ventas, por lo que solicita a FUSAI un crédito para invertir en la compra de productos tales como: arracadas, pulseras, anillos, cadenas, zapatos, blusas, faldas, pantalones, etc. Y así lograr mejorar sus ventas al igual que sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Ana, 38, lives with her partner and they have two children aged 17 and 8.  Both of these are studying at the moment. 

She is an enterprising woman who has been earning a living for the past eight years by selling products from catalogues. She wants to increase her sales so she is asking FUSAI for a loan to invest in merchandise such as: earrings, bracelets, rings, chains, shoes, blouses, skirts, trousers, etc.  

This will help her to increase her sales and earn more profit.

loans.use: to buy general clothing products and accessories to improve her small business.

loans.name: Magdalena Adelina

texts.es:
Magdalena es una joven soltera de 19 años de edad, vive en San Vicente junto a su familia.
Es una joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Su principal objetivo en estos momentos es apoyar a su mamá quien tiene un puesto de ventas de frutas en el mercado. Magdalena trabaja desde hace 1 año como Asistente en un Estudio Contable y tiene un buen desempeño en el trabajo gracias a la ética con la que se desempeña y a los valores con la que fue inculcada desde niña.
Magdalena está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella comprará mercadería, diversos tipos de frutas como mandarina, lucuma, uva, granadilla, entre otros para que su negocio mejore. Así pues, ella seguirá esforzándose para más adelante poder convertirse en una gran profesional y buscar mejores oportunidades laborales.
texts.en:
Magdalena is a young, single woman aged 19.  She lives in San Vicente with her family.

She is very keen to get on in life. Her main objective at the moment is to support her mother who has a fruit stall at the market. 

She has been working for one year as an assistant at an accountant's and she has been doing well thanks to her ethical attitude to work and the values that were instilled in her as a child.

She is grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their support, she can buy different produce for the fruit stall such as mandarins, lucumas, grapes, pomegranates and other things which can improve their business. As a result, she can continue to strive to get along and become a great professional and seek better employment opportunities.

loans.use: to buy fruit to supply her business.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
Laboriosa y soñadora, son dos palabras que describen perfectamente a Teresa, una mujer trabajadora y de familia, que hace lo que este a su alcance para ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y esposo.

Se gana la vida con la cría y venta de pollos de engorde en el municipio de Honda.

Esta es una actividad muy común en esta región y gran parte de sus habitantes la practican.

Ella posee gran conocimiento en esta materia y considera que necesita un pequeño impulso para incrementar sus ventas y aumentar su negocio, es por esta razón que solicita un auxilio económico para invertirlo en la compra de pollos, concentrados, mallas para la adecuación de su galpón.

Con este préstamo podrá continuar con su actividad que es la única fuente de ingresos de su familia.

Se siente muy entusiasmada con esta ayuda.
texts.en:
"Hard-working" and "dreamer" are two words that describe Teresa perfectly. Teresa is a hard-working family woman who does everything that she can to offer her husband and children a better quality of life.

Teresa earns a living raising and selling chicken in the municipality of Honda.

This is very common work in the region, with many inhabitants earning a living this way.

Teresa is very knowledgeable about this work and believes that she needs a little boost in order to increase sales and expand her business. She is therefore applying for financial help in order to buy chickens, feed and mesh to set up a coop.

With this loan, Teresa will be able to continue with her work, which is her only source of income for the family.

Teresa is very enthusiastic about this loan.

loans.use: to buy chickens, feed and mesh to set up a coop.

loans.name: Gonzalo Antonio

texts.es:
Gonzalo de 28 años de edad, estudio hasta 8° grado, su estado civil es acompañado y su pareja es vendedora en los buses, tiene 2 hijos de 5 y 3 años de edad que aún no ingresan a la escuela, con su pareja son los encargados del cuido de sus hijos. 

Gonzalo desde hace 6 años se dedica a la venta de CD y de casett de música, aprendió porque un amigo se dedica al negocio y le gusto, ahora trabaja en lo propio, en frente de su casa esta una gasolinera y ahí se pone a vender en una bicicleta desde las 7:00 am a 5:00 pm. 

El crédito lo solicita para comprar CD por mayor, casett y otra parte para comprar frutas, ya que su pareja vende en los buses. 

EL sueño en un futuro es tener una tiendita en su casa, ya que la calle donde trabajan es muy transitada y se vuelve peligrosa, también espera contar con buena salud para ver crecer a sus hijos y poder darles el estudio.
texts.en:
Gonzalo is 28 years old and has an eighth-grade education. He has a partner, who sells goods on public buses. The couple has two children, aged five and three years old. They are not yet attending school; the couple looks after the children together.

For six years Gonzalo has made a living selling CDs and cassettes with music on them. He learned this trade from a friend who works in the same type of business, and he likes it. Gonzalo now does this work on his own. There is a petrol station opposite his house and there he sells his goods from his bicycle from 7am until 5pm.

Gonzalo is applying for this loan in order to buy CDs and cassettes in bulk, and to buy fruits, which his partner sells on buses.

Gonzalo's dream is to have a little shop in his house as the street outside has many passers-by; it can be dangerous. Gonzalo also hopes to keep up his good health in order to see his children grow up, and to give them an education.

loans.use: to buy CDs and cassettes in bulk, and to buy fruits, which his partner sells on buses.

loans.name: Siyabia

texts.fr: Siyabia est mariée et mère de cinq(5) enfants dans le quartier d’Agoè. Elle est âgée de 54 ans et exerce comme activité l’achat et vente du mil et du maïs. Pour diversifier son activité, Siyabia y ajoute la vente de la boisson locale(Tchouk) qu’elle prépare. Elle s’approvisionne deux fois par mois à Atakpamé et Anié situées au nord du Togo, elle revend à la devanture de son domicile.Siyabia sollicite un prêt pour agrandir son stock avec 15 sac de maïs et 6 sacs de mil afin de faire des bénéfices considérables.
texts.en:
Siyabia is the married mother of five children, and lives in the Agoè neighborhood. She is 54 years old and has a business trading millet and maize.

To diversify her business, Siyabia also prepares and sells a local beverage (Tchouk). She resupplies twice a month in Atakpamé and Anié in the north of Togo, and conducts her retail sales in front of her home.

Siyabia is requesting a loan to expand her stock with 15 bags of maize and 6 bags of millet, and make considerable profits.

loans.use: buy 15 bags of maize and 6 bags of millet

loans.name: Agnes

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de Trois(3) enfants, Agnès réside dans le quartier d’Agoè. Elle est âgée de 32 ans et exerce comme activité la vente des produits d’alimentation générale. Elle s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé puis revend par la vente ambulante dans son quartier de résidence et ses environs.Agnès sollicite un prêt pour augmenter son stock de 3 cartons de lait en poudre et  milo, afin de satisfaire les clients et faire des bénéfices considérables.
texts.en:
Married with three children, Agnès lives in the Agoè neighborhood. She is 32 years old and runs a business selling general food products.

She resupplies four times a month at the main market in Lome, and then conducts her retail sales as an itinerant vendor in her neighborhood and the surrounding areas.

Agnès is requesting a loan to increase her stock supply with three cartons of powdered milk and Milo (brand of powdered chocolate and malt), to satisfy her customers and make considerable profits.

loans.use: buy three cartons of powdered milk and Milo (brand of powdered chocolate and malt)

loans.name: Intwari Ii Group

texts.fr:
J. Bosco  fait partie du groupe  Intwari II et  habite à  Bujumbura. C’est un célibataire de  36 ans.  

Il fait le commerce des habits  depuis  7 ans. 

Il est à son cinquième    crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  beaucoup d’habits à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il  voudrait  acheter une parcelle, et voir se enfants étudier.
texts.en:
J. Bosco is part of the Intwari II group, and lives in Bujumbura. He is a single 36-year-old, and has been trading clothes for the past seven years. 

This is his fifth credit loan with Turame. He will use the Kiva loan to increase his working capital and buy a large quantity of clothes for resale, to earn more. 

In coming years he would like to buy a plot of land and ensure his children's education.

loans.use: increase his working capital and buy a large quantity of clothes for resale, to earn more.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone and a solar charging set so that she can provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Karla Adriana

texts.es:
Karla es una joven madre de familia de una hermosa niña de 2 años, es soltera, tiene 23 años de edad y vive en Rupa Rupa junto a su familia.
Es una persona con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Su hija es su mayor motivación en la vida para salir adelante, es por ella que lucha día a día para poder brindarle un futuro mejor. Desde hace casi un año trabaja en un restaurante como Azafata, brinda servicios de atención al cliente, le va muy bien gracias a todos los valores que sus padres le inculcaron desde pequeña. 
Karla piensa comprar un electrodoméstico (televisor) con el préstamo para que de esta manera pueda mejorar su calidad de vida y así poder continuar con su trabajo de manera tranquila. Está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva por todo el apoyo que le han brindado ya que gracias a ello ella podrá brindarle mayores oportunidades a su pequeña y así más adelante podrá cumplir uno de sus más grandes sueños: "Tener su propio negocio de venta de comida y darle una educación de calidad a su hija".
texts.en:
Karla is a young mother with a beautiful 2 year old daughter.  She is single, 23 years old, and she lives in Rupa Rupa together with her family.  She is a person with a great desire to get ahead.  Her daughter is her greatest motivation in life for moving forward, and it is for her that she struggles each day in order to provide her daughter with a better future.  For nearly a year she has been working in a restaurant as a waitress, offering service to customers, and things are going well thanks to the values that her parents taught her as a child.

Karla is thinking of buying a television with this loan in order to improve her quality of life and thus continue to work in a relaxing manner.  She is very thankful to Kiva lenders for al of the help they have offered since thanks to them she will be able to offer better opportunities to her daughter and thus be able to accomplish her great dreams: "To have my own business of food sales and to give me daughter a quality education."

loans.use: To buy a television.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy zinc sheets and rafters in order to change the roof of his home that is in poor condition.

loans.name: Rosa Guillermina

texts.es:
La Señora Rosa es una socia amable y gentil que forma parte del grupo de crédito La Paz, este grupo de crédito le gusta por la solidaridad y amistad, siempre se apoyan mutuamente para salir adelante, en cada reunión se turnan para realizar comida y compartir con todas sus compañeras. Vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad goza de un clima frió y de varios lugares hermosos donde se puede disfrutar de la naturaleza, fue proclamada ciudad patrimonio de la humanidad desde Diciembre de 1999 gracias a la belleza de su arquitectura, su gente es amable y gentil.
La Señora Rosa tiene 24 años de edad, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido una hija de 6 años que está estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad, está muy emocionada ya que se encuentra embarazada de 2 meses, su esposo labora como mecánico, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
Doña  Rosa es una socia muy luchadora que siempre  busca la manera de mejorar la estabilidad económica de su hogar, se dedica a la venta de granos y hace poco también se dedica a la venta de comida rápida y le va muy bien.
Esta repitiendo el crédito para comprar granos y víveres para la preparación de la comida rápida.
texts.en:
Rosa is a friendly, kind member of the La Paz communal bank. She likes this communal bank because of the solidarity and friendship, they always support each other to make it through. They take turns to make food and share it with all their friends at each meeting.

She lives in the city of Cuenca, this city enjoys a cold climate and many beautiful places to enjoy nature. It was declared a World Heritage City in December 1999 thanks to the beauty of its architecture, its people are friendly and gentle.

Rosa is 24 years old, she is married and the fruit of their marriage is a daughter of 6 years old, who goes to a small school in the city. She is very excited that she is 2 months pregnant, her husband works as a mechanic, they don't have their own house so they are renting.

Rosa is a member who struggles hard and always looks for a way to improve her family's financial stability. She works selling grains and a short time ago started selling quick meals and it's going very well.

She is taking another loan to purchase grains and for the preparation of quick meals.

loans.use: to buy grains and foodstuffs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy kitchen appliances.

loans.name: Martha Yolanda

texts.es:
La Señora Martha  es una socia amable y gentil que forma parte del grupo de crédito La Paz, este grupo de crédito le gusta por la solidaridad y amistad, siempre se apoyan mutuamente para salir adelante, en cada reunión se turnan para realizar comida y compartir con todas sus compañeras. Vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad goza de un clima frió y de varios lugares hermosos donde se puede disfrutar de la naturaleza, fue proclamada ciudad patrimonio de la humanidad desde Diciembre de 1999 gracias a la belleza de su arquitectura, su gente es amable y gentil.
La Señora. Martha tiene 24 años de edad, vive en unión libre y ha concebido una hija de 7 años que está estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad, su esposo labora en un taller de mecánica, no tienen casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.

Doña Martha tiene una relojería donde vende repuestos, da mantenimiento todo tipo de relojes, este negocio le da la oportunidad de pasar más tiempo a lado de sus hijos y cuidar de su familia. 

Esta repitiendo el crédito para la compra de nuevos modelos de relojes para ampliar su mercadería.
texts.en:
Martha is a friendly, kind member of the La Paz communal bank. She likes this communal bank because of the solidarity and friendship, they always support each other to make it through. They take turns to make food and share it with all their friends at each meeting.

She lives in the city of Cuenca, this city enjoys a cold climate and many beautiful places to enjoy nature. It was declared a World Heritage City in December 1999 thanks to the beauty of its architecture, its people are friendly and gentle.

Martha is 24 years old, she lives in a common law marriage and has a seven year old daughter who attends the local school. Her husband works in a mechanic shop. They live in a rented home.

Martha has a watchmaking shop where she sells spare parts, does repairs on all types of watches, this business gives her the opportunity to spend more time with her children and take care of her family.

She is requesting another loan to buy new models of watches to expand her range of merchandise.

loans.use: to buy clocks.

loans.name: Janneth Alexandra

texts.es:
La Señorita Janeth es una socia que se encuentra en su segundo crédito a lado de sus amigas y compañeras del grupo de crédito San Pablo, le han invitado a este hermoso grupo unas amigas y los créditos le están beneficiando para crecer en el negocio. Vive por las afuera de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es muy conocida por su belleza arquitectónica la misma que le dio el nombre de Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, cuenta con varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza y de momentos familiares.
La Señorita Janeth tiene 18 años de edad, está soltera y vive en con sus padres quienes tienen casa propia.
Ella está estudiando en una academia de belleza, le va muy bien  y está en su segundo año, para solventar sus gastos se dedica a la venta de frutas actividad que la realiza 4 días a la semana sin un horario fijo. El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de frutas de temporada. Su meta es graduarse y llegar a tener su propio local.
texts.en:
Janeth is a member who is on her second loan with her friends who are the other members of the San Pablo credit group. She was invited to this beautiful group of friends and the loans are benefitting her to grow in the business. She lives outside of Cuenca. It is a city that is very well known for its architectural beauty, which led to its being named a World Heritage Site. It has several places to enjoy nature and family time. 

Janeth is 18 years old. She is single and lives with her parents, who own their own home. She is studying at a beauty school and it is going very well for her. She is in her second year and in order to pay for her expenses, she sells fruit, an activity she does 4 days a week without a set schedule. She will use the money fro the loan to invest in buying fruit in season. Her goal is to graduate and have her own locale.

loans.use: to buy fruit.

loans.name: Yuli Janet

texts.es:
Yuli es una madre de familia de 35 años de edad, conviviente y vive en Chincha junto a su familia. Tiene un maravilloso hijo de 5 años de edad quien es su mayor motivación en la vida para salir adelante porque quiere brindarle las oportunidades que ella no pudo tener cuando era pequeña porque sus padres eran de bajos recursos económicos. Desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para apoyar a su familia y eso la convirtió en una persona mucho más fuerte y decidida. Desde hace algún tiempo se dedica a la venta de Huevos de Codorniz en una carreta que tiene. Le va muy bien porque es muy trabajadora, responsable, emprendedora y sobre todo porque tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.
Yuli está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar ventanas y una puerta para mayor seguridad de su hogar. De esta manera podrán vivir en una casa más segura y cómoda y seguirá luchando para más adelante poder ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Yuli is a 35 year old wife and mother. She lives in Chincha with her family. She has a wonderful 5 year old son who is her main motivation to get ahead in life, because she wants to give him the opportunities that she wasn't able to have when she was young because her parents were of low income. Since she was very young, she had to work to support her family and this made her a much stronger and decisive person. For some time, she has worked selling quail eggs in a cart that she has. It is going very well for her because she is hardworking, responsible, enterprising and above all she is eager to get ahead. 

Yuli is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because with the support they have given she will be able to buy a door and windows for more security for her home. This way, they can live more safely and comfortably and she will keep fighting to get ahead so she can expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy windows and a door for her house.

loans.name: Lenys

texts.es: Lenys de 40 años es la propietaria de un taller de confecciones , actividad que empezó a desarrollar después de haber estudiado diseño de modas y graduarse en esta profesión. Su grupo familiar está compuesto por su esposo y sus 2 hijas en las edades de 15 y 20 años , con quienes sueña ver educados con mucha calidad, lo cual es la meta familiar mas importante. Cuando inició su negocio en el año 2008 su impulso de tener su propio taller relacionado con lo que había estudiado, la llevó a organizar su negocio de confecciones; desde ese momento trabaja iniciando su labor a las 8 de la mañana y finalizandola alas 6 de la tarde, comprando de contado en almacenes de telas de la ciudad y vendiendo a clientes entre familiares, amigos y referidos. Su mata mas adelante es ampliarlo comprando maquinarias y contratando personal, con lo cual lograría aumentar su productividad. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará en un mayor volumen, telas, hilos y accesorios, con el propósito de incrementar su producción e igualmente sus ventas y mejorar el negocio con esta inversión.
texts.en: Lenys is 40 years old. She is the owner of a seamstress hop. She started this activity after studying fashion and graduating with that degree. Her family group is made up of her husband and 2 daughters, aged 15 and 20. She dreams of a quality education for them and that is her most important family goal. When she started her business in 2008, she decided to have her own workshop related to what she studied. That led to her organizing her her sewing business. Since then, she has worked from 8 in the morning until 6 in the evening. She pays for her fabrics up front at the store in the city and sells to customers, including friends, family members and referrals. Her goal for the future is to expand by buying machines and hiring people, which will increase her productivity. Right now, she is applying for a Kiva loan, the first loan she has taken out with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With it, she will buy larger quantities of fabrics, thread and accessories. This is to increase production and her sales so she can improve her business with this investment.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of fabric, thread and accessories.

loans.name: Irakoze Iii Group

texts.fr:
Férdinand  fait partie du groupe  Irakoze et  habite à  Bujumbura. Il  a 38 ans et est marié à Jeanne, une  commerçante. Ensemble ils on 8 enfants âgés de 2 à 23 ans, dont 7 étudient.

Il fait le commerce du lait de beauté  depuis  20 ans. 

Il  est  à son dixième  crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de lait  beauté à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il  voudrait  construire une maison, acheter une voiture  et voir se enfants. étudier.
texts.en:
Férdinand belongs to the Irakoze group and lives in Bujumbura. He is 38 years old and married to Jeanne, who is a trader. They have eight children, ranging from two to 23 years old, seven of whom are studying.

He has been buying and selling beauty lotion for the past 20 years and is on his tenth loan from Turame. With the Kiva loan he is granted he is going to increase his capital and buy a large quantity of beauty lotion to resell, so that he can make more money.

Over the coming years he would like to build a house, buy a car and see his children through school.

loans.use: to increase his capital and buy a large quantity of beauty lotion to resell and earn more money.

loans.name: Ankassongnogontama Group

texts.fr: Les membres du groupe   ANKASSONGNOGONTAMA   sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  26 ans, 6 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à FAKOLA, une des sous-préfectures de la 3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités à tout moment. Elles sont à leur premier prêt avec l’institution et compte bien le rembourser.Mme  MINATA  1ère personne à gauche sur la photo compte acheter avec son prêt 5 sacs de mais. Elle vend quotidiennement au marché et à la maison. Elle s’approvisionne à FAKOLA et environnant. Elle vend au comptant à une clientèle mixte.Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 20 000FCFA.Ce bénéfice va la permettre de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the Ankassongnogontama group are married women who average 26 years of age with six children each; they all live in polygamous families in Fakola, one of the sub-prefectures of Mali's third administrative region. They collaborate with the microfinance institution, Soro Yiriwaso, so that they can run their activities smoothly at all times. They are on their first loan from the institution and expect to be able to repay it without difficulty.

Minata, who is sitting on the left of the photo, is planning to buy five sacks of corn with her loan. She sells her produce daily at the market and from home, and gets her supplies in Fakola and the surrounding areas. She sells for cash to a diverse customer base. She expects to make an average monthly profit of 20,000FCFA, and this profit will enable her to repay her loan and also help out her husband with the daily outgoings.

loans.use: to buy cereals.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr: Les membres du groupe  BENKADI sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  32 ans, 5 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à FAKOLA, une des sous-préfectures de la 3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités à tout moment. Elles sont à leur cinquième prêt avec l’institution et compte bien le rembourser.Mme  MARIAM  2ème personne sur la photo de la droite à la gauche  compte acheter avec son prêt 5 douzaines d’habits pour enfants et 10 pagnes wax. Elle vend quotidiennement à FAKOLA et est très sollicitée surtout le jour de foire.Elle s’approvisionne à FAKOLA, GUEYA et BAMAKO. Elle vend au comptant à une clientèle mixte.Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 40 000FCFA.Ce bénéfice va la permettre de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the Benkadi group are married women who average 32 years of age with five children each; they all live in polygamous families in Fakola, one of the sub-prefectures of Mali's third administrative region. They collaborate with the microfinance institution, Soro Yiriwaso, so that they can run their activities smoothly at all times. They are on their fifth loan from the institution and expect to be able to repay it without difficulty.

Mariam, who is sitting second from the right in the photo, is planning to buy five dozen sets of children's clothes and ten "pagnes wax" (brightly colored and highly decorative pieces of fabric) with her loan. She sells her products daily in Fakola and is in great demand, particularly on fair days. She gets her supplies in Fakola, Gueya and Bamako and sells for cash to a diverse customer base. She expects to make an average monthly profit of 40,000FCFA, and this profit will enable her to repay her loan and also help out her husband with the daily outgoings.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Sali

texts.fr: SALI est née en  MARS 1980 à BAMAKO, capitale du Mali. Mme SALI est âgée de 34ans ; elle est mère de 3 enfants et réside à FAKOLA avec son mari dans une famille nucléaire. Mme SALI s’est vite intéressée aux activités génératrices de revenus notamment à l’achat et vente d’habits .Sa vente se fait à FAKOLA au marché et chez elle à la maison.  Forte de  ses 9 années d’expérience dans le domaine, elle collabore avec Soro Yiriwaso pour augmenter  son fonds de commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle qui ne cesse de grandir et est à son  quatrième  prêt. Mme SALI compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 20 dizaines d’habits pour enfants  et 10 pagnes wax. Elle s’approvisionne à FAKOLA et à BAMAKO. Elle effectue ses ventes au comptant et quelques fois à crédit. Sa clientèle est mixte. Mme SALI espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 85 000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour  subvenir aux besoins de la famille, rembourser le prêt et réinvestir dans les activités.
texts.en: Sali was born in March 1980 in Bamako, the capital of Mali. She is 34 years old, mother to three children and lives in Fakola with her husband in a nuclear family. She began to be interested in income-generating activities at an early age, and in particular in the purchase and sale of clothing. She sells her products in Fakola, at the market at from home. With nine years of experience in this field, she collaborates with Soro Yiriwaso so she can expand her business and satisfy customer demand which is constantly growing; she is on her fourth loan. She plans to use this loan to buy 20 dozen sets of children's clothing and ten "pagnes wax" (pieces of brightly colored and highly decorative fabric). She gets her supplies in Fakola and Bamako and sells for cash and sometimes on credit. She has a mixed customer base. Sali hopes to make a monthly profit of 85,000FCFA, which will be used to provide for her family's needs, repay her loan and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Mylie

texts.en:
Mylie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fruit vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 13000 through NWTF to purchase more fruits to sell for her fruit vending business.

Mylie has been in this business for 3 years. Mylie earns more income from food vending.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more fruits to sell.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is 31 years old and married with two children who are in school.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to purchase more inventory to sell like chips, soft drinks, etc.

Nenita has borrowed and repaid 4 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 3 years and also earns an income from food vending.

She aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more inventory to sell like chips, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Oscar Antonio

texts.es:
Oscar de 47 años de edad, no tubo la oportunidad de estudiar ya que los padres no tenían la posibilidad de mandarlo a la escuela, esta acompañado la esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y han procreado 6 hijos los cuales 4 viven con él y uno va a la escuela.

Oscar se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenia 12 años de edad, este trabajo se lo enseño el papá ya que desde pequeño lo llevaba al trabajo y fue así que Oscar solo de ver iba aprendiendo el oficio que el papá realizaba y el padre le decía que se fijara mucho y aprendiera el oficio, porque eso le iba a servir mucho y fue así ya que de eso es la forma de como ha ido sacando adelanta a los hijos, el lugar de donde trabaja le queda a una distancia de 20 minutos y viaja a pie en un horario de las 6:00 a.m. a las 11:00 a.m. pero también Oscar tienen una granja de pollos en la casa para que la esposa este trabajando con ellos y le ayude a tener otra fuente de ingresos para la familia.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar los insumos agrícolas para la milpa de verano, comprara cuatro sacos de abono y el veneno pero también comprara 50 pollos de engorde, para que la esposa los cuide y cuando estén gordos mandarlos al mercado ya que ellos trabajan con clientes que se los compran por libras esto ayudara mucho, ya que con el dinero compraran de un solo el abono y el veneno y el pollo y también el concentrado suficiente para que se engorden bastantes.

Sus sueños son que siempre Dios le de vida y salud para  trabajar y enseñarle a los hijos el trabajo para que ellos se defiendan cuando ya estén en hogares apartes y darles el estudio hasta donde ellos puedan para que se defiendan en la vida, ya que como padres es la única herencia que le dajan a los hijos.
texts.en:
Oscar is 47 years old and did not have the opportunity to go to school as his parents could not send him. Oscar is married; his wife takes care of the household chores. The couple has six children; four lives at home still, and one is in school.

Oscar has been working in farming since he was twelve years old. His father taught him this trade as, from a young age, he took him to work. By doing this, Oscar learned his father's work; his father told him to pay attention and learn about farming as it would be very helpful to him. And, indeed, through farming work, Oscar has helped his children to move forward in life. Oscar's land is a 20-minute walk from his home. He works at farming from 6am until 11am. Oscar also has a chicken farm at his home. His wife works with the poultry and helps to earn another income for the family.

This loan from CrediCampo will be used to buy farming supplies for the summer cornfield: Oscar will buy four bags of manure and venom, and 50 chickens for his wife to look after and to send to the market when they are fattened up. (Oscar and his wife work only with customers who buy by the pound). This loan will be used to buy all these items and feed in one go. The feed will be used to make sure that the chickens are fat enough.

Oscar's dreams are for God to give him life and good health to work and teach his children his trade and give them an education, so that they may look after themselves when they have their own homes. As parents, this is the only thing that Oscar and his wife can leave his children.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for the summer cornfield: Oscar will buy four bags of manure and venom, and 50 chickens for his wife to look after and to send to the market when they are fattened up. (Oscar and his wife work only with customers who buy by the pound).

loans.name: Rodita

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Rodita works hard to support her family.

She has a manicure and pedicure service business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from rice retailing. Rodita is borrowing PHP 9000 through NWTF to buy additional materials for her manicure and pedicure service business.

Rodita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 4 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her business.

loans.name: N’Tiko Group

texts.fr: Les membres du groupe   N’TIKO   sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  38 ans, 7 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à FAKOLA, cercle de KOLONDIEBA,  une des préfectures de la 3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités à tout moment. Elles sont à leur deuxième prêt avec l’institution et compte bien le rembourser.Mme  MINATA 1ère personne sur la photo de la gauche à la droite  compte acheter avec son prêt 3 colis de condiments. Elle vend quotidiennement à FAKOLA et est très sollicitée surtout le jour de foire.Elle s’approvisionne à FAKOLA et environnant. Elle vend au comptant à une clientèle mixte.Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 20 000FCFA.Ce bénéfice va la permettre de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the N'tiko group are married women who average 38 years of age with seven children each; they all live in polygamous families in Fakola, in the Kolondieba circle, one of the prefectures of Mali's third administrative region. They collaborate with the microfinance institution, Soro Yiriwaso, so that they can run their activities smoothly at all times. They are on their second loan from the institution and expect to be able to repay it without difficulty.

Minata, who is on the far left of the photo, is planning to buy three packs of condiments with her loan. She sells her produce daily in Fakola and is in great demand, particularly on fair days. She gets her supplies in Fakola and the surrounding areas. She sells for cash to a mixed customer base. She expects to make an average monthly profit of 20,000FCFA, and this profit will enable her to repay her loan and also help out her husband with the daily outgoings.

loans.use: to buy condiments.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es: Lucia es divorciada y tiene dos hijos, ella vive en El Alto en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que es de su propiedad Lucia se dedica a la venta de pasankallas (son como las palomitas de maiz bolivianas)  y tambien elabora mantillas para las cholas bolivianas (mujeres indigenas de bolivia)Entre las condiciones duras de trabajo esta que Lucia debe hacer esfuerzos con la vista Lucia necesita un prestamo para arreglar un muro de su taller de costura Lucia es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por lo que necesita su ayuda
texts.en:
Lucia is divorced and has two children.  She lives in El Alto in a house made of brick and cement that she owns.

Lucia earns a living selling "pasankallas" (it's like Bolivian popcorn) and making shawls for Bolivian "cholas" (native Bolivian women).  Among Lucia's difficult working conditions is that she struggles with her eyesight.

Lucia needs a loan to repair a wall in her sewing workshop.  She's the only source of income in her household so she needs the help.

loans.use: to repair a wall in her sewing workshop

loans.name: Sigidia Group

texts.fr: Les membres du groupe  SIGIDIA sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  33 ans, 3 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à FAKOLA, cercle de KOLONDIEBA,  une des préfectures de la 3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités à tout moment. Elles sont à leur premier prêt avec l’institution et compte bien le rembourser.Mme  ROKIA  1ère personne sur la photo de la gauche à la droite  compte acheter avec son prêt 3 colis de condiments. Elle vend quotidiennement à FAKOLA et est très sollicitée surtout le jour de foire.Elle s’approvisionne à FAKOLA et environnant Elle vend au comptant à une clientèle mixte.Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 15 000FCFA.Ce bénéfice va la permettre de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en: The members of the Sigidia Group are married women with an average age of 33. They have an average of three children and all live in polygamous families in Fakola, in the area of Kolondieba, one of the prefectures in the third largest administrative region in Mali. The women work with the micro-finance organization Soro Yiriwaso to better operate their businesses year-round. They are on their first loan and intend to fully repay it. Ms. Rokia, the person at the far left in the photo, plans to buy three packages of condiments with her loan. She sells daily in Fakola and is very sought-after, especially on the day of the fair. She buys her supplies in Fakola. She sells for credit to a mixed clientele. She expects to earn an average monthly profit of 15,000 FCFA. This profit will enable her to repay her loan as well as help her husband with their family's daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy condiments.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr: Les membres du groupe  BENKADI  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  32 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à KOLONDIEBA, une des préfectures de la 3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités à tout moment. Elles sont à leur deuxième prêt avec l’institution et compte bien le rembourser.Mme  KIATOU  2ème personne sur la photo de la gauche à la droite compte acheter avec son prêt 4 sacs de tubercules. Elle vend quotidiennement à KOLONDIEBA et est très sollicitée surtout le jour de foire.Elle s’approvisionne à KOLONDIEBA. Elle vend au comptant à une clientèle mixte.Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 10 000FCFA.Ce bénéfice va la permettre de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en: The members of the Benkadi Group are married women with an average age of 32. They have an average of four children and all live in polygamous families in Kolondieba, one of the prefectures in the third largest administrative region in Mali. The women work with the micro-finance organization Soro Yiriwaso to better operate their businesses year-round. They are on their second loan and plan to fully repay it. Ms. Kiatou, second from the left in the photo, plans to buy four bags of yams with her loan. She sells daily in Kolondieba and is very sought-after, especially on the day of the fair. She buys her supplies at Kolondieba. She sells for credit to a mixed clientele. She expects to earn an average monthly profit of 10,000 FCFA. This profit will enable her to repay her loan as well as help her husband with their family's daily expenses

loans.use: to buy yams.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Norma works hard to support her family. She works running a dried fish business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from direct-selling Avon products and pig fattening. Norma has been sustaining her business activities through her past 13 loans from NWTF.

Norma is requesting a 21,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase fish to make dried fish. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fish to make dried fish

loans.name: Sigimame Group

texts.fr: Les membres du groupe  SIGIMAME  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  34 ans, 3 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à FAKOLA, cercle de KOLONDIEBA,  une des préfectures de la 3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités à tout moment. Elles sont à leur premier prêt avec l’institution et compte bien le rembourser.Mme  KADIA  1ère personne sur la photo de la gauche à la droite  compte acheter avec son prêt 1 sac de condiments. Elle vend quotidiennement au marché et est très sollicitée surtout le jour de foire.Elle s’approvisionne à FAKOLA et environnant. Elle vend au comptant à une clientèle mixte.Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 10 000FCFA.Ce bénéfice va la permettre de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en: The members of the Sigimame Group are married women with an average age of 34. They have an average of three children and all live in polygamous families in Fakola, in the area of Kolondieba, one of the prefectures in the third largest administrative region in Mali. The women work with the micro-finance organization Soro Yiriwaso to better operate their businesses year-round. They are on their first loan and intend to fully repay it. Ms. Kadia, the person at the far left in the photo, plans to buy one package of condiments with her loan. She sells daily at the market and is very sought-after, especially on the day of the fair. She buys her supplies in Fakola and nearby. She sells for credit to a mixed clientele. She expects to earn an average monthly profit of 10,000 FCFA. This profit will enable her to repay her loan as well as help her husband with their family's daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy condiments.

loans.name: Gilberth Osvaldo

texts.es: Gilberth de 21 años de edad vive con su madre, su compañera de vida y su hijo de 3 años de edad. Él es un hombre emprendedor que se gana la vida lavando vehículos en un local. Pero desea asociarse con su madre que se dedica a elaborar prendas de vestir  para colocar un taller de costura en su domicilio. Por lo que solicita a FUSAI un crédito para invertir en la compra de telas, hilos, agujas, botones, zipper, etc. Para mejorar las ventas de sus productos y así mismo sus ingresos. Gilberth expresa estar muy agradecido con FUSAI dado que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado va saliendo adelante y poco a poco va mejorando sus finanzas.
texts.en: Gilberth, 21 years old, lives with his mother, his life partner and his 3-year-old son. He is an enterprising man who earns his living washing vehicles in a business. But, he wants to join with his mother who works making clothing to make a tailoring shop in his house. For this reason, he asks FUSAI for a loan to invest in the purchase of fabric, thread, needles, buttons, zippers, etc. to increase sales of her products and also her income. Gilberth says he is very grateful with FUSAI since thanks to the support he has been offered, he continues on and little by little he is improving his finances.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, thread, needles, buttons, zippers, for a tailoring shop.

loans.name: Vilma Eugenia

texts.es:
Vilma de 47 años de edad,  madre soltera con dos hijos menores de edad, es originaria de  Leon, esta mujer, se caracteriza por ser trabajador, responsable con ganas de superación personal.  Lamentablemente por la falta de empleo fijo en el país se vio en la necesidad de tener un empleo informal como es la venta de ropa, bolsos, perfumes,  en su casa de habitación.  Actividad que la disfruta mucho, y además ha sido la forma de vida de su familia.
Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad económica, tiene por actividad la venta de ropa en general como pantalones, blusas, short, faldas, ropa de niño perfumes, crema de cuerpos, labiales, bolsas de mujer. El negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación. Ella dedica  unas diez horas diarias a su negocio, para mantener su clientela. El objetivo del crédito es surtir su negocio y aprovechar la fiesta patricia, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. Vilma agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua  para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Vilma is 47 years old and is the single mom of two dependent children.  She is from Leon and is characterized as being a responsible, hard worker with a desire for personal improvement. Unfortunately, due to the lack of regular employment in the country, it was necessary for her to engage in her informal job of selling clothing, handbags, and perfumes out of her house. She enjoys this work very much and it has been a way of life for her family. 

Thanks to her efforts and her desire to get ahead, she has been able to establish a business selling clothing in general such as pants, blouses, shorts, skirts, children's clothing, perfumes, body lotions, lipstick, and women's handbags. She spends about ten hours every day at work to tend to her customers.  The purpose of the loan is so that she can stock her store in view of the coming patriotic festivals. This will allow her to increase her earnings in the near term.  Vilma is grateful for the assistance that Kiva investors provide to people of scarce economic resources in poor countries such as Nicaragua, allowing them to have a dignified way to earn a living.

loans.use: to invest in working capital to supply her business by buying pants, blouses, shorts, skirts, children's clothing, perfumes, body lotion, lipsticks, and women's purses.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos es un joven soltero de 21 años de edad, vive en San Vicente junto a su familia.
Es una persona emprendedora, a su corta edad ha sabido salir adelante y apoya a su familia en los gastos del hogar. Actualmente estudia la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas y trabaja en un Prestigioso Banco, siempre se esfuerza en todo lo que hace y es muy luchador.
Carlos está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá construir su cuarto para poder tener mayor comodidad y mejorar su calidad de vida, gracias a esto seguirá desempeñando su labor con gran entusiasmo para más adelante poder cumplir un gran sueño: "Convertirse en un excelente profesional para que sus padres se sientan orgullosos de él".
texts.en:
Carlos is a single young man, 21 years old, who lives in San Vincente with his family. 

He is an enterprising person; at his young age he has gotten ahead and supports his family with the household expenses.  He currently is studying a professional degree in business administration and works in a prestigious bank; he always puts effort into everything he does and is very determined.

Carlos is grateful to the Kiva lenders because, with the support that they have offered him, he will be able to build a room to be able to be more comfortable and improve his quality of life, thanks to this he will continue enthusiastically with his work so that in the future he will be able to realize his great dream: to become an excellent professional so that his parents will be proud of him.

loans.use: to build a room.

loans.name: Teódulo

texts.es:
Teódulo de 77 años de edad, no pudo asistir a una escuela, pero aprendió a escribir y leer.

Por más de 20 años se ha dedicado a la agricultura y ganadería y aprendió por su familia, ya que la fuente de ingreso a dependido de los rubros, cuando siembra por lo general son 28,000 metros cuadrados de maicillo y 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz en un terreno que está a la par de su vivienda.

El crédito es para la compra de pastaje, decido a que la sequía hizo perder los cultivos, su ganado no tiene como alimentarse por este motivo tiene la necesidad del préstamo. 

El sueño es que cuando siembra tenga buena cosecha, ya que invierten para ello pero por las cuestiones climáticas no son favorables y pierden, además espera tener más ganado lechero en un futuro y que su hijo termine el año escolar.
texts.en:
Teódulo, 77 years old, wasn't able to go to school, but he learned to read and write.

For over 20 years, he has worked in agriculture and animal husbandry, learned from his family, since his source of income has depended on these lines of work. When he plants, generally he has 28,000 square meters of millet and 7,000 square meters of corn on his land that is next to his house. 

The loan is to purchase forage. Due to the drought, he lost his crops, and his livestock don't have anything to eat, and for this reason he needs a loan. 

His dream is that when he plants, he has a good harvest, since he invests for this, but the weather isn't favorable and he lost it. In addition, he hopes to have more dairy cows in the future and that his son finishes his school year.

loans.use: to purchase forage. Due to the drought, he lost his crops and his livestock don't have anything to eat, and for this reason he needs the loan.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone and a solar charger to provide vital farming information to his community

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es: Manuel de 44 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus 5 hijos de 20 años, 18 años, 17 años, 16 años y 10 años de edad. Él es un hombre emprendedor que desde hace 20 años se dedica a trabajar como jornalero, además junto a sus hijos se dedica a la agricultura sembrando granos básicos como: maíz y frijol, lo que le permite cosechar para consumo y venta. Manuel desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda ya que como se observa en la fotografía este se encuentra bastante deteriorado. Por lo que solicita a FUSAI un crédito para comprar: lámina galvanizada y madera para cambiar el techo de su vivienda.
texts.en: Manuel, 44 years old, lives with his wife and 5 children, ages 20, 18, 17, 16 and 10 years old. He is an enterprising man who, for the past 20 years, has worked as a day laborer. In addition, with his children he works in agriculture cultivating staples such as corn and beans, which allows him to harvest them for consumption and sale. Manuel wants to replace the roof of his home since, as can be seen in the photograph, it is rather deteriorated. For this reason, he asks FUSAI for a loan to purchase galvanized metal sheeting and wood to replace the roof on his home.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized metal sheeting and wood to replace the roof of his home.

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en: Estrella is married with three children. She is 54 years old and lives in Boundary, Sapang Dalaga. Estrella is a farmer and grows vegetable crops to earn a living. She has been doing this for 15 years. She has requested a loan to purchase fertilizers and chemicals. Estrella has been a member of PMPC for five years. In the future, Estrella hopes to harvest more vegetable crops and supply neighboring villages.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase mouse feed and equipment that will allow him to scale his operation to meet demand.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase flour and to renovate his workplace

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy mobile phone devices

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone and a solar charger to provide vital farming information to his community

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase stationery and copying supplies, and to renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy an iron and sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and an overlock sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy an iron, a sewing machine and an overlock machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and renovate her workplace.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her grandson's school fees.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a generator and air conditioner.

loans.name: Gresilda

texts.en: Gresilda is 53 years old, single and a resident of Sta. Filomena, Dipolog City, Philippines. Starting with a capital of 5,000 pesos, she opened a sari-sari (variety) store and was able to expand it with the help of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative. Aside from financial assistance, she was able to generate savings and enjoys the benefits given by the Coop. She became a member in March 2010 and has taken out several loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items for her sari-sari (variety) store

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth, 57 years old, is separated and lives in Manukan. She has two children.

From her desire to help the family, she engaged in fish vending with a meager capital of 3,000 pesos. The business has been going for 17 years now. 

Elizabeth reached Paglaum to borrow a loan to pay for more kilos of fish to sell.

In the future, Elizabeth wants to repair her house to live comfortably.

loans.use: to pay for more kilos of fish to sell

loans.name: Saturnino Tovias

texts.es:
Saturnino de 28 años de edad, estudio hasta 8º grado, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios del hogar, tienen 2 hijos de 9 y 5 años de edad, que viven con ellos, el mayor estudia 4º grado y la menor aun no ingresa, de él depende su esposa e hijos.

Saturnino tiene un negocio de venta de electrodomésticos, desde hace 2 años trabaja en lo propio, y aprendió ya que era ayudante de otras personas, su horario de trabajo es de 8 am a 2 pm; se va en carro a las 4 comunidades donde trabaja, ofrece sus productos y lo da por cuotas a sus clientes. 

Él solicita el préstamo para invertir en electrodomésticos, comprara licuadoras, planchas, tostadora, hamacas de seda, ya que tiene gente que le ha encargado los electrodomésticos y no tiene el capital suficiente para comprarlos. 

El sueño para el negocio, es mantenerlo e incrementarlo ya que es la única fuente de ingreso que hace mantener a su familia, y darle lo mejor a sus hijos incluyendo el estudio.
texts.en:
Saturnino, 28 years old, went to school up to the 8th grade, is married, and his wife takes care of the household tasks. They have 2 children, ages 9 and 5, who live with them. The older one is in 4th grade and the younger one hasn't started school yet.  His wife and children depend on him. 

Saturnino has a business selling household appliances. For the past 2 years, he has worked in this field, and he learned it since was an assistant for other people. His work schedule is from 8 am to 2 pm. He goes by car to the 4 communities where he works, offers his products, and sells them to his customers with payment plans. 

He asks for this loan to invest in household appliances, to purchase blenders, irons, toasters, silk hammocks, since he has people who have ordered the household appliances and he doesn't have sufficient capital to purchase them. 
 
His dream for the business is to maintain and increase it since it is the only source of income that he has to maintain his family and give the best to his children, including school.

loans.use: to purchase household appliances, blenders, irons, toasters, silk hammocks, since he has people who have ordered the household appliances and he doesn't have sufficient capital to purchase them.

loans.name: Merita

texts.en:
Merita is a 40-year-old villager from the district of Korca, just southeast of the country. She’s got two children who still go to schools, respectively. All that she does is agriculture/livestock, and she sees it as profitable, she says. She plants in small quantities and sells wheat, corn, potatoes and beans, and also raw milk to a nearby dairy farm, and baby calves to locals. The village where she resides is known for the large production of wheat, corn, beans and potatoes, and other grains such as vetch, oats and rye. 

Merita has already two cows and wants this loan to invest in another one. Now that her children are almost grown-ups, they help her with the activities, especially with the livestock, according to her. 

Merita wants to thank lenders in advance for the financial help.

loans.use: to invest in a dairy cow

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a generator and an overlock sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy an air-conditioner and an iron.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy an air-conditioner and an electric scissor.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es: Rosa de 54 años de edad es madre soltera y vive con su hija y un nieto de 11 meses. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que desde hace mucho tiempo colocó su pequeño negocio de venta de comida y pupusas. Además al finalizar la venta de comida elabora prendas de vestir por encargo en su domicilio. Rosa desea colocar balcones en las ventanas de su vivienda ya que como se observa en la fotografía estas son solo de vidrio, lo que le provoca inseguridad a su familia por la fragilidad de dicho material. Por lo anterior solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar balcones de hierro y lámina para las ventanas y techo de su vivienda.
texts.en: Rosa, 54 years old, is a single mother and lives with her daughter and 11-month-old grandson. She is a hard-working woman who, a long time ago, established her small business selling food and pupusas. In addition to selling food, she makes clothing to order in her house.  Rosa wants to put security railings in the windows of her house since, as can be seen in the photograph, these are only glass, which causes insecurity for the family due to the fragility of this material. For this reason, she asks FUSAI for a loan to purchase iron railings and window laminate, and metal sheeting for the roof of her house.

loans.use: to purchase iron security railings, and window laminate, and metal sheeting for the roof of her house.

loans.name: Karla Veronica

texts.es: Karla Verónica, mayor de edad madre soltera de dos hijas las cuales a pesar de ser menores de edad trabajan y estudian en la universidad por cuenta propia, originaria del departamento de Chinandega, ubicado en la zona de occidente del país, se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora, responsable, y con muchos deseos de superación es administradora y propietaria de una hermosa pulpería ubicada en su casa de habitación, donde ofrece a la población productos de consumo diario para el hogar y en cantidades pequeñas como: sobre de café, sobres de shampoo, aceite, pan, leche, huevos, caja de  fósforo, verduras, refresco, granos básicos, hielo, gaseosas, productos congelados, agua purificada, papel higiénicos, sardinas, medicamentos, leña, entre otros mas, ademas tiene otros ingresos de venta de frijoles cocidos a diario los cuales le generan otra entrada mas, sus compras son al contado en distribuidoras, mercados y camiones distribuidores de esta misma localidad, sus ventas son al contado a clientes fijos y eventuales, este negocio surge por la necesidad de tener un medio de trabajo y una fuente de ingresos al verse sola y con sus dos hijas, inicia su negocio con fondos y capital propios, ya que son productos que todos consumimos en cualquier época del año, empieza con una pequeña ventecita y así ha venido creciendo poco a poco, Karla Verónica ya ha trabajado con León 2000 y ha demostrado su responsabilidad de pago en tiempo y forma, uno de sus sueños es poder crecer en su negocio, mejorar un poco su vivienda quedándole mas espacio para su pulperia, el objetivo de este nuevo financiamiento es para invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra de Granos básicos en general, gaseosas, golosinas, productos congelados entre otros, al incrementar su inventario puede comprar a mejores precios, surtir todo lo que pueda y tener los productos mas demandantes y así obtener mayor volumen de ingresos y ofertarles mejores precios y satisfacer a sus clientes, Karla Verónica, agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan  a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.-
texts.en: Karla Verónica is an older single mother of two daughters who, despite being minors, work and study in the university, paying their own way. She is originally from Chinandega department, located in the western region of the country. She is an enterprising, responsible woman with great desire to improve herself. She is administrator and owner of a lovely grocery store located in her house, where she offers the population products for everyday consumption for the home and in small quantities such as coffee packets, shampoo packets, oil, bread, milk, eggs, boxes of matches, vegetables, cold drinks, basic grains, ice, soft drinks, frozen products, purified water, toilet paper, sardines, medicines, and firewood, among others. In addition, she has other income from the sale of fresh prepared beans, which generate an additional inroad. Her purchases are made in cash from distributors, markets, and distribution trucks at this location. Her sales are made in cash to regular and occasional customers. This business came up due to the necessity to have a means of work and a source of income since she was alone with her two daughters. She began this business with her own funds and capital, since they are products that everyone uses throughout the whole year. She began with a small stall and since has grown little by little. Karla Verónica has worked with León 2000 in the past and has shown her responsibility for paying on time and correctly. One of her dreams is to be able to grow her business, and improve her home a bit, making more space for her store. The goal of this new loan is to invest in working capital and stock her business with the purchase of general basic grains, soft drinks, candies, and frozen products, among other items. Upon increasing her inventory, she can purchase the products at better prices, stock everything she can, and have the high-demand products and, in turn, have a greater volume of income and offer better prices and satisfy her customers. Karla Verónica is grateful for the help the Kiva lenders offer to people of limited resources and in poor countries such as Nicaragua to have a means of dignified work.

loans.use: to purchase products for everyday consumption for her grocery store such as basic grains, frozen foods, soft drinks, among others

loans.name: Maria Tomasa

texts.es: María de 52 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y su hija. Ella es una mujer tenaz que desde hace 7 años se dedica a prestar sus servicios domésticos, además su hija aporta a la economía familiar por medio de su trabajo. María desea construir un baño con pila en su vivienda para lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: cemento, arena, hierro, grava y ladrillo, además deberá pagar mano de obra necesaria para la construcción de su baño con pila.
texts.en: María, 52 years old, lives with her life partner and her daughter. She is a tenacious woman who, for the past 7 years, has worked providing domestic services. In addition, her daughter supports the family economy through her work. María wants to build a bath with a pila (a traditional large basin) in her house, and for this she asks FUSAI for a loan to purchase cement, sand, iron, gravel, and brick, and additionally to pay the labor costs to build her bathroom with pila.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, iron, gravel, and brick, in addition she has to pay the labor costs necessary to build her bathroom with a pila (a traditional large basin).

loans.name: Kol

texts.en:
A loan in an amount of 250,000 Albanian Lek (ALL) will help Kol buy new/old parts to repair refrigerators and washing machines.

Kol is 58 and has three children, all almost grown-ups, with one of them being born semi-paralyzed; Kol’s wife looks after the son and receives a caretaker’s sort of income in addition to the disability income of their son.  

Kol has a shop where he repairs mostly refrigerators and washing machines; this has been his profession now for a very long time, and he went to school to acquire the skills. 

Kol and his family live in a little town in central Albania, and he is the only one in the town to practice home appliance repair; this gives him the opportunity for more work and money. 

The loan he is applying for this time will be the first one for him. He had some money saved for the rainy days; however, recently, he paid for some therapies for their paralyzed son.

loans.use: to buy some new/old parts for repairing home appliances for the shop where he practices his profession

loans.name: Gjelina

texts.en:
In this photograph is Gjelina with her adorable 5-year-old son, who couldn’t wait to be in the photo, according to the loan officer. With the amount of 100,000 Albanian Lek that she is requesting from you, she wants to finish off building a fence around her family’s house; the money she had saved was not enough so that she could finish it off. 

Gjelina has been doing agriculture/livestock for a living; she plants mostly corn and sells part of it, and the other part of the produce she uses as animal feed for her two cows, the one goat and the 30 chickens. Added to that, she plants also seasonal veggies and sells some of the fresh produce. Her husband works in construction making cement bricks.

loans.use: to finish off building the house fence

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and an air-conditioner.

loans.name: Erion

texts.en:
Erion is an Egyptian Albanian who has chosen to live in a village, unlike the majority of other members of his community who have lived forever in the suburbs of cities. He is a 35-year-old married father of two, who are nine and five years old.  

Erion has been practicing agriculture/livestock to earn a living for his family of four; he’s got dairy cows and sells the raw milk to a dairy farm built in his village; he also plants large quantities of potatoes and beans and in smaller quantities seasonal veggies and sells them to wholesale buyers/sellers. 

Erion wants your financial help to buy a reaping machine (harvester), and he wants to thank you in advance for the potential help. This will be his first loan with the VisionFund institution.

loans.use: to purchase a harvester

loans.name: Diturije

texts.en:
This is Diturije, being photographed in the stable with her three dairy cows. She wants to add another cow to her herd with your financial help.  All she’s been doing so far to earn a living has been raising livestock and she finds it not as hard as planting and harvesting, as per her saying. She sells the raw milk and sometimes she makes unsalted cheese and sells the dairy products whether raw or prepared to locals. Her husband works as a musician for events that take place in the city of Korca, known for serenades, vocal performances or instrumental music.

Diturije is a villager who lives in the southeastern part of the country and is a 32-year-old married mother of two school-aged children, 15 and 10 years old. In order to increase her family's income, she needs to add another cow to the existing herd.

loans.use: to add another cow to the existing herd

loans.name: Gloria Aida

texts.es:
Gloria tiene 47 años de edad, estudió hasta 3º grado, está casada y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura, tiene 7 hijos de los cuales 3 trabajan y cuatro están estudiando. 

Gloria se dedica a la crianza de aves, tiene 10 años de comprar y vender aves y huevos, su pequeña granja la tiene en su casa. 

El préstamo lo necesita muchísimo  para comprar pollos, mejorará su vida ya que tendrá ingresos para ella y su familia. 

Ella planea que su granja crezca y que en un futuro tenga más ingresos.
texts.en:
Gloria is 47 years old, she went to school up to the 3rd grade, is married and her husband works in agriculture. They have 7 children, of whom 3 work and four are students. 

Gloria works raising poultry. For 10 years she has bought and sold poultry and eggs; she has her small farm at her house.

The loan is greatly needed to purchase chickens. She will improve her life since she will have income for herself and her family.

She plans to grow her farm and in the future have more income.

loans.use: to purchase chickens; she will improve her life since she will have income for herself and her family.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a generator and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone and a solar charging set  so that he may provide vital farming information to his community

loans.name: Sajad's Group

texts.en:
Sajad is a member of this group from Iraq. Sajad is 26 years old, married and has one child. 

Sajad has a small shop selling kitchen supplies and accessories like spoons, glasses, knives, etc. Sajad started his business approximately six years ago to generate income to cover his family’s expenses.  

Sajad will use this loan to buy more kitchen tools and to renovate his workplace. This will help him to increase his profits to provide a good life for his family. He aims to grow his business and increase his profits so that he may be able to provide a good life for his family.

The story of Sajad and his business is just one of the many examples of Izdiharona for economic development clients.

loans.use: to buy more kitchen supplies and accessories and to renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone and a solar charging set  so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Luis Fernando

texts.es:
Luis tiene 19 años de edad, su estado civil es soltero, sin hijos a su cargo, vive en casa se sus padres en el distrito de Oyotun el la provincia de Chiclayo en la región de Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú, en este distrito la població se dedica a la agricultura y al comercio de animales; este lugar es una zona rural.

Luis se dedica a brindar servio de obrero – jornalero en los campos de cultivos con años de experiencia en el rubro solicita préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa el monto es de 1000 nuevos soles para la compra de herramienta de trabajo(mochila para fumigar) y dar mantenimiento al resto de ellas para mejorar su trabajo; obtener mejores ingresos y apoyar a su familia.
texts.en:
Luis is 19 years old, single, without children in his care, and lives in his parents' house in Oyotun district, Chiclayo province, in Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Perú.  In this district, the people work in agriculture and selling animals; it is a rural area. 

Luis works as a day laborer in the fields with years of experience in this work. He asks Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles to purchase work tools (a knapsack fumigation sprayer) and to do maintenance on the rest of his tools to improve his work and get better income and support his family.

loans.use: to invest in purchasing a knapsack fumigation sprayer and maintenance for his tools.
